text: So I know I'm in vacation but I thought I would check in and see if we have a date for ebc install?
I guess it would also be nice to know if the demo is still working :)
No date yet
Demo is half working. I think the caps need a charge
There was one cap (I think we moved it out of the lineup) that didn't respond on Friday
I pinged Shashi on Friday about scheduling the install. He is going to get back to me this week.
I need to take a photo of the caps working on the wine rack - @joelm - let me know if you have a few lit up that I can snap a photo of.
Other topic is related to IP - I saw some emails while I was out - do I need to schedule time for this or is it already in progress?
In progress, led by <@U0B9N0HF0>

<@U026NB2U2>: for more context: I was having issues staying connected to the caps this morning when I tried, even with a longer USB cable. I figure it’s both radio strength and possibly battery, so 10 caps are charging now.
I found a longer USB cable and will see if that works before EOD
Can we look at Wednesday as an installation date?
<@U02F8LF2X>: <@U02E3CRMA>
uh sorry I've been sick the last few days and haven't made wine rack progress
Can it be done by Wednesday? We lost someone at EBC after Wednesday
I don't know maybe
I can work on it tomorrow
K. Let me see what our options are. Joel how are you feeling about an install this week?
ok, as long as I get a chance to check in with <@U0K8ZSHN0> before we deploy
just to make sure everything’s buttoned up, and we have a user’s guide together for things like charging, etc
K. I'll let Shashi know we need to check in w Lee tomorrow and will circle back.
And maybe we schedule a dry run of show tomorrow. I'll set something up.
good call
Sent an invite for 4:30 tomorrow
